name: Lucy Mitchell
summary: Hi! I'm a passionate and curious software engineer with 4 years of hands-on experience in full-stack and backend development. I've been lucky to grow my skills through a graduate apprenticeship while studying Software Engineering at the University of Glasgow. I love building clean, scalable backend systems in Java, working with APIs and databases, and creating practical solutions that make a difference. I'm comfortable working across the stack with tools like Angular and SQL, and I enjoy collaborating in Agile teams, mentoring juniors, and continuously learning. I'm all about writing solid code, sharing ideas, and delivering value together.

education.notes: Completed alongside full-time software engineering work as part of a graduate apprenticeship.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Graduate Apprentice)
responsibilities: Designed and developed backend services using Java (incl. Spring Boot, Maven), supporting core internal tools across development teams.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs and data integration layers with SQL and Java, optimizing performance and maintainability.
Created frontends using Angular and TypeScript where required, ensuring cohesive full-stack functionality.
Implemented comprehensive test coverage using JUnit and integrated testing into CI pipelines.
Deployed containerized applications using Kubernetes within CI/CD workflows.
Participated in Agile delivery cycles and mentored junior developers on team processes and engineering best practices.

projects.title: Test Environment Dashboard
details: Developed backend logic in Java and SQL to aggregate and expose test environment data via APIs.
Built a simple frontend using Angular for visual representation, focusing on backend-first architecture.
Integrated multiple third-party systems using both RESTful and SOAP APIs.

projects.title: Automated Test Double Tool
details: Led development of a backend system to simulate responses from dependent services, reducing test complexity.
Built API services in Java with REST endpoints; frontend was added using Angular and TypeScript.
Integrated with automation frameworks for continuous testing use cases.

projects.title: Mentorship & Onboarding
details: Provided technical onboarding, code reviews, and guidance to junior team members, improving team productivity and cohesion.
